name: Planetoid
story:
"INCOMING!"

Navigator Abdullah's voice screeches through your head. The starship rumbles as a Klyeon spore-pod slams into it. Alarms blare. "Brace for impact!"

The ship streaks through the planetoid atmosphere, a red-orange fireball of shields. The cratered surface hurls toward you.

Darkness.

You wake up outside the darkened wreckage of the ship, still in your RBX-672 suit. Stale, machine-recycled air fills your nostrils. Your head aches.

On what forsaken Klyeon planetoid did your ship crash-land?
